products.title: Bella Blackout Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This Taupe Brown electric roller blind works with any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  The soft brown hue of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2068 Fabric Colour: Taupe Brown Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This saturated Mocha Brown electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control, and due to their chain-free design, are inherently child-safe! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This medium brown electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
